devdoc.details: A decentralized raffle system with a progressive jackpot

claimJackpot().details: Function for the winner to claim the jackpot

constructor.details: Constructor to initialize the raffle parameters

params._claimPeriod: Time window for winner to claim the prize in seconds
params._jackpotPercentage: Percentage of ticket price that goes to jackpot (1-99)
params._maxTicketsPerPurchase: Maximum tickets that can be purchased in a single transaction
params._raffleDuration: Duration of the raffle in seconds
params._ticketPrice: Price of each ticket in wei

endRaffle().details: Function to end the raffle and select a winner Uses block hash as a source of randomness combined with other parameters

getRaffleState().details: Function to get the current raffle state

returns._2: uint256 Time remaining until raffle ends

getTicketsByOwner(address).details: Function to get tickets owned by an address

returns._0: uint256[] Array of ticket IDs owned by the player
